price: አንተ የወደድከውን ሰው ፈጽሞ አታቀናም፡፡ ግን አላህ የሚሻውን ሰው ያቀናል እርሱም ቅኖቹን ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡
arabic: إِنَّكَ لَا تَهۡدِي مَنۡ أَحۡبَبۡتَ وَلَٰكِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَهۡدِي مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَهُوَ أَعۡلَمُ بِٱلۡمُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innaka lā tahdī man aḥbabta walākinna al-laha yahdī man yashāu wahuwa aʿlamu bil-muh'tadīna
